A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Forget the bad reviews. Watch Episode 1-3 and then watch this. Huge difference in quality compared to Lucas' last 3 installments\, which were umm... hate to say it garbage. Both Rian Johnson and JJ Abrams showed the genius that George Lucas had in Episode 4 & 5. George even admitted loving this movie...I would even bet that he had a tad of envy.
